name: AntiBucket
description: It's not a phase, Mom! You're a rebellious bucket who's only goal in life is to remain empty of water. Avoid falling bricks and rain as long as you can.   This game was developed in 48 hours by William Savage for the Ludum Dare 40 Compo.  Tools used: GameMaker Studio 2 | Bosca Ceoil | Gravit Designer | Photoshop
